sourcesContent:
import resolveConfig from "tailwindcss/resolveConfig"
import config from "./tailwind.config.js"
const tw_config = resolveConfig(config)

const THEME_COLORS = tw_config.theme.cool_fresh.colors

const COLORS = {
  PRIMARY: THEME_COLORS.primary,
  TEXT_PRIMARY: THEME_COLORS.text_primary,
  TEXT_SECONDARY: THEME_COLORS.text_secondary,
  ACCENT_DARK: THEME_COLORS.accent_dark,
  ACCENT_LIGHT: THEME_COLORS.accent_light
}
